title: THE.DEVIL'S.CHAIR.2007.PAL.DVDR.MULTISUBS[19] -Lindoff
description:
When a young couple stumble upon a bizarre chair their attempts at sexual adventure turn into a nightmare. Years after the event, one of the couple is struggling to come to terms with what went on and a reknowned Cambridge professor attempts to soothe his anguish with experimental treatment. Ultimately, they return to the scene of the crime to discover the dreadful truth about The Devil's Chair...

Special Features
Commentary with Writer/Director Adam Mason, Writer Simon Boyes and Actor Andrew Howard
Making of The Devil's Chair

Technical Details
Actors Andrew Howard, Pollyanna Rose, Olivia Hill, Nadja Brand, Eric M. Breiman, Gary Mackay, David Gant, Louise Griffiths, Elize Du Toit & Matt Berry
Director Adam Mason
Certificate 18 years and over

Region Region 2
